com.radiotelescope.contracts.appointment.wrapper

Class BaseUserAppointmentWrapper

  • com.radiotelescope.contracts.appointment.wrapper.BaseUserAppointmentWrapper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserAutoAppointmentWrapper, UserManualAppointmentWrapper

    public class BaseUserAppointmentWrapper

    Base Wrapper that takes an interface AppointmentFactory and is responsible for all user role validation for type-agnostic endpoints for the Appointment Entity

    See Also:
    interface AppointmentFactory

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BaseUserAppointmentWrapper(UserContext context, AppointmentFactory factory, IAppointmentRepository appointmentRepo, IViewerRepository viewerRepo)
      Base Wrapper that takes an interface AppointmentFactory and is responsible for all user role validation for type-agnostic endpoints for the Appointment Entity

                                  AppointmentFactory factory,
                                  IAppointmentRepository appointmentRepo,
                                  IViewerRepository viewerRepo)

        Base Wrapper that takes an interface AppointmentFactory and is responsible for all user role validation for type-agnostic endpoints for the Appointment Entity

        Parameters:
        context - the interface UserContext interface
        factory - the interface AppointmentFactory factory interface
        appointmentRepo - the interface IAppointmentRepository interface
        viewerRepo - the interface IViewerRepository interface

      • invalidAppointmentIdErrors

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Collection> invalidAppointmentIdErrors(long id)

        Private method to return a Map of errors when an appointment could not be found. This is needed when we must check if the user is the owner of an appointment or not

        Parameters:
        id - the Appointment id
        Returns:
        a Map of errors
        See Also:
        Map
